price: Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn nsisi nnipa wͻ hwee ho, na mmom nnipa no ara na wͻsisi wͻn ho.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ ٱلنَّاسَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha lā yaẓlimu al-nāsa shayan walākinna al-nāsa anfusahum yaẓlimūna
